name: lively
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 full of energy and enthusiasm; interesting and exciting : It's hard work teaching a class of lively children. a lively city They take a lively interest in their grandchildren. There was some lively discussion at the meeting.
(of colours) bright and strong: The room was painted a lively electric blue.
More examplesFewer examplesThese debates have made a successful series, mostly because of well-chosen speakers and lively topics.Angela's so cheerful and lively - she's like a breath of fresh air when she visits.There were lively New Year celebrations all over town.The party was certainly lively.We had a lively discussion.
